meanings.definition: Traditional knowledge or beliefs passed down through generations.
meanings.sent1: In our family, the lore about planting crops has been shared for centuries.
meanings.sent2: The lore of the ancient civilization is fascinating to study.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa's lore about talking animals always makes us smile.
meanings.sent4: The lore of the lost city captured the imagination of explorers.
meanings.sent5: The lore of the haunted house made the children shiver with excitement.

meanings.definition: A body of knowledge or tradition on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The lore of astronomy includes the study of stars and planets.
meanings.sent2: She delved deep into the lore of herbal medicine to find a cure.
meanings.sent3: The lore of baking cakes is a sweet tradition in our family.
meanings.sent4: The lore of photography reveals the art of capturing moments.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the lore of dinosaurs brings the past to life for children.

meanings.definition: Stories or myths that are passed down orally.
meanings.sent1: The lore of the brave knight defeating the dragon is a favorite tale.
meanings.sent2: Children love listening to the lore of magical creatures in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The lore of the talking animals always brings laughter to the listeners.
meanings.sent4: The lore of the sea monsters is a thrilling story told by sailors.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the lore of ancient gods reveals fascinating myths and legends.
